sepaemail.SepaEmailBody:
I hereby authorize payments to be made from my account to {$config.sepaCompany} via direct debit. At the same time, I instruct my financial institution to honor the debits drawn from my account.

Note: I may request reimbursement for the debited amount up to eight weeks following the date of the transfer, in accordance with preexisting terms and conditions set by my bank.

config.theme_description: Theme structure without CSS and JavaScript
config.author: shopware AG
config.display_sidebar_description: Display navigation as a sidebar to the left of the product listing.
config.checkout_header_description: Show checkout steps in a simplified header during the checkout process – otherwise a normal header will be shown.
config.checkout_footer_description: Show checkout steps in a simplified footer, displaying only the most important information.
config.enable_infinite_scrolling_description: Dynamically extend the listing on scroll down.
config.infinite_threshold: Number of pages for infinite scrolling
config.infinite_threshold_description: Number of pages which will be loaded automaticly caused by infinite scrolling.
config.lightbox_zoom_factor: Scale factor of the picture box (lightbox)
config.lightbox_zoom_factor_description: Defines the maximum scale factor for the lightbox. When set to 'Automatic', the limit is set to the size of the original image to prevent blurring.
config.focus_search_description: Display the search bar on the home page in mobile view.
config.ajax_variant_switch_description: If active, variants will now be loaded dynamically instead of reloading the page.
config.apple_touch_icon_precomposed: If checked, iOS will not apply any glass effects to your Apple Touch Icon.
config.bare_min_appearance_description: Disables all unnecessary features of the bare theme. The sidebar and all sliders will not be shown.
config.bare_max_appearance_description: Enables all additional features of the bare theme. Sliders, shopping worlds and sidebars will be shown in the frontend.
config.offcanvas_move_method_description: Overlay the shop page instead of moving it to the side.
config.show_filter_in_sidebar_description: Displays the listing filters in the sidebar below the menu. If the sidebar is not active, the filters are not displayed.
config.async_javascript_loading_description: If active, JavaScript files will be loaded asynchronously.

config.author: shopware AG
config.additional_css_data_description: Use this field to include external services like Google Fonts.
config.additional_js_libraries_description: Use this field to include scripts like Google Analytics or other external services. Please include local JavaScript components by using the $javascript array
config.color_scheme_turquoise_description: Configures the responsive theme with different turquoise tones
config.color_scheme_green_description: Configures the responsive theme with different green tones
config.color_scheme_red_description: Configures the responsive theme with different red tones
config.color_scheme_pink_description: Configures the responsive theme with different pink tones
config.color_scheme_gray_description: Configures the responsive theme with different gray tones
config.color_scheme_brown_description: Configures the responsive theme with different brown tones
config.color_scheme_blue_description: Configures the responsive theme with different blue tones
config.color_scheme_black_description: Configures the responsive theme with different black tones
config.color_scheme_orange_description: Configures the responsive theme with different orange tones
